page.title: 15COMMERCE.
page.content: There are two main shopping precincts in our area,{Headington}and{Marston.} {Headington}is the larger of the two. Its facilities include fast-food stores, video hire shops, opticians and a furniture store, along with those shops you would find in even the smallest of areas.There are four large supermarkets,and{7-eleven,}an American idea which sells many different items. A large proportion of the buildings are banks, building societies and estate agents. There is certainly a lot of choice on how to get the best value for saving money, but if you prefer to spend it, you could have your hair cut, hire a video, video tape or a television, buy a computer, have your eyes checked, buy yourself a pet, visit a restaurant or take-away, browse through an antique shop or place a bet on the days races!
